title: Best NFL Fan Base
itunes:title: Best NFL Fan Base
description:
A room filled with a hero? -- Dan Hanzus is joined by Dave Dameshek as the duo team up to breakdown the latest NFL news, including Sean Payton’s comments on Drew Brees and which team has the best fans in the NFL. Plus, Shek gives an update on his Spotify playlist before the pair end the podcast by diving into the ATN Mailbag and the best football movies!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
